content.raw:
I think we need to update the zmq version requirements. Here and on lines 83 & 84.

Ignition transport 4 will make use of this, which will run on Xenial and above. Some the features added to  ign-transport4 (or in PRs) require zeromq 4. Xenial ships with 4.1.4.

We could change line 59 to: `pkg_check_modules(ZeroMQ libzmq>=4.0.0)`

We could also change line 83 & 84 to: `set(_zmq_versions "4_1_4" "4_0_4" "4_0_3" "4_0_2" "4_0_1" "4_0_0")`
